page.title: 13Royston Drift Mine Gala
page.content: Royston Drift Gala started in 1978 as a follow-up to the Jubilee year.It is held every year in June at Royston Park, the most central place. It is a gala for workers at Royston Drift Mine which is organised by Royston Drift sports and social club committee. It is held just for an enjoyable day out.Any money made goes to local charities. The gala is sponsered by firms associated with the N.C.B. local shop-keepers,pubs,clubs and local organisations. There are plenty of activities e.g. bouncing castles and boat swings. Competitions include Miss Miners Lamp, Bonny_baby,Majorettes,five_a_side and races.There is a Bird show and a Brass band.Stalls include sweets,jumble sale,plants,and hot_dogs.
